categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Orrian was a Cargo ferry used by the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War.

Orrian, along with sister ship Lundi and MC40a light cruiser Condor were to rendezvous with Airam forces lead by Clan leader Tamaron to replenish the Rebel's Warhead supply at his Asteroid Hangar Attila. However rival Airam forces lead by Ilay, a clan leader sympathetic to the Galactic Empire, sent T-wings from Bravo to disrupt the meeting. X-wings from Rogue Squadron and Gold Squadron intercepted the T-wings, however, Assault Gunboats and Imperial-class Star Destroyer Wasp soon arrived. Both Rebel squadrons held out long enough for the transfers to be completed and all ships to enter hyperspace
